text: 12:13 Isei 118:25,26Maram aduna makhoina thangtup pambigi masasing puduna Ibungobu okpa chatlammi aduga makhoina laorak-i, “Hosanna!12:13 Hosanna: Hebrew wahei asi handokpada eikhoibu kanbiyu haibani adubu matam aduda wahei asi Ishwor thagatpagi wahei oina sijinnarammi. MAPU IBUNGO-gi mingda lenglakliba mahak adu yaiphabani! Israel-gi Ningthou adu yaiphabani!”
